data.Sentence_cn: 罗伊.特雷顿原是开出租汽车的，
data.Sentence: Roy Trenton used to drive a taxi.

data.Sentence_cn: 然而就在前不久，他开上了公共汽车，也并不为此而感到后悔。
data.Sentence: A short while ago, however, he became a bus driver and he has not regretted it.

data.Sentence_cn: 他发觉自己的新工作令人兴奋得多。
data.Sentence: He is finding his new work far more exciting.

data.Sentence_cn: 最近，当他正开车在凯特福德街上行驶时，
data.Sentence: When he was driving along Catford Street recently,

data.Sentence_cn: 看到有两个小偷从一家商店里冲出来，奔向等在那里的一辆汽车，
data.Sentence: he saw two thieves rush out of a shop and run towards a waiting car.

data.Sentence_cn: 其中一个提着一只装满钞票的提包。
data.Sentence: One of them was carrying a bag full of money.

data.Sentence_cn: 罗伊行动迅速，开车直冲窃贼而去。
data.Sentence: Roy acted quickly and drove the bus straight at the thieves.

data.Sentence_cn: 拿钱的那个小偷吓得把提包都扔了。
data.Sentence: The one with the money got such a fright that he dropped the bag.

data.Sentence_cn: 当那两个小偷企图乘车逃跑时，罗伊驾驶他的公共汽车撞在了那辆车的后尾上。
data.Sentence: As the thieves were trying to get away in their car, Roy drove his bus into the back of it.

data.Sentence_cn: 当那辆被撞坏的车开走后，罗伊停下车，给警察挂了电话。
data.Sentence: While the battered car was moving away, Roy stopped his bus and telephoned the police.

data.Sentence_cn: 小偷的车损坏严重，很容易辨认。
data.Sentence: The thieves' car was badly damaged and easy to recognize.

data.Sentence_cn: 没过多久，警察就截住了那辆车，两个小偷都被抓住了。
data.Sentence: Shortly afterwards, the police stopped the car and both men were arrested.
